# Genesis Oil
## Overview
**Aura** strong conjuration; **CL** 17th

**Slot** —

**Price** 7,650 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This sparkling prismatic oil hums with energy. When spread across an appropriate gemstone (of at least 25,000 gp value), it creates a demiplane as the spell *[[Genesis (Spell)|genesis]]*. The type of gemstone determines which plane the demiplane appears in and to which it is linked.  A diamond creates it in the [[Astral Plane]]; a jacinth creates it in the [[Ethereal Plane]]; a green emerald creates it in the First World; a ruby creates it in the Dream realm and a black star sapphire creates it in the Plane of Shadow.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Genesis (Spell)|genesis]]*;

**Cost** 3,825 gp

**Source:** John Raymond
